pipeline.value: [{$match: { $or: [ { ibkOrg: { $ne: '00001' } }, { ibkOrg: { $eq: null } }, { ibkName: { $ne: '总行（本部） ' } }, { ibkName: { $eq: null } } ] }}, {$group: { _id: { ibkOrg: '$ibkOrg', ibkName: '$ibkName' }, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': { $sum: '$traCny' }, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0': { $max: '$traCny' } }}, {$project: { _id: 0, ibkOrg: '$_id.ibkOrg', ibkName: '$_id.ibkName', 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': { $cond: { if: {$eq: ['$Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0', null]}, then: null, else: '$Sum_交易金额折人民币' } } }}, {$sort: { ibkOrg: 1, ibkName: 1 }}, {$limit: 5000000}]
pipeline.stage: {$group: {_id: {ibkOrg: '$ibkOrg', ibkName: '$ibkName'}, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': {$sum: '$traCny'}, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0': {$max: '$traCny'}}}
{$project: {_id: 0, ibkOrg: '$_id.ibkOrg', ibkName: '$_id.ibkName', 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': {$cond: { if: {$eq: ["$Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0", null]}, then: null, else: "$Sum_交易金额折人民币"}}}}

pipeline.value: [{$match: { $or: [ { ibkOrg: { $ne: '00001' } }, { ibkOrg: { $eq: null } }, { ibkName: { $ne: '总行（本部） ' } }, { ibkName: { $eq: null } } ] }}, {$group: { _id: { ibkOrg: '$ibkOrg', ibkName: '$ibkName' }, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': { $sum: '$traCny' }, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0': { $max: '$traCny' } }}, {$project: { _id: 0, ibkOrg: '$_id.ibkOrg', ibkName: '$_id.ibkName', 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': { $cond: { if: {$eq: ['$Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0', null]}, then: null, else: '$Sum_交易金额折人民币' } } }}, {$sort: { ibkOrg: 1, ibkName: 1 }}, {$limit: 5000000}]
pipeline.stage: {$group: {_id: {ibkOrg: '$ibkOrg', ibkName: '$ibkName'}, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': {$sum: '$traCny'}, 'Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0': {$max: '$traCny'}}}
{$project: {_id: 0, ibkOrg: '$_id.ibkOrg', ibkName: '$_id.ibkName', 'Sum_交易金额折人民币': {$cond: { if: {$eq: ["$Sum_交易金额折人民币_max0", null]}, then: null, else: "$Sum_交易金额折人民币"}}}}
